g.text: Consume Prepare event message for Payer
Request information for the validate checks
Validate message signature (to be confirmed in future requirement)
Position-Topic (message 1) instead of querying the DB.
Request to retrieve current/latest transfer settlement window
Request to append the transfer to current/latest transfer settlement window
Route & Publish Position event for Payee
Route & Publish Notification event for Payee
To be delivered by future story
